comment.author: 31471851@N07
comment._content:
Have lived in New Radnor for 60 years and I am not aware that this Hotel has/does exist. Will make some enquiries, watch this space.

JLM 09/10/2010

comment.author: 32119741@N08
comment._content: I have shown this picture to people who have lived here all their lives, and they confirm my view that it is not in New Radnor. I have checked old trade directories in Llandrindod Wells Library and can find no record of a Talbot Hotel here.

comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content:
Thank you very much for your comments we will look in to the matter and find out the exact location.
Regards

comment._content: definitely not New Radnor, however no idea where it is!
